root.name: Pong: The Next Level
root.description: In Europe the game is called simply "Pong" and not "Pong: The Next Level" as it is known stateside.The gameplay is based around the same tennis-style gameplay that made the original Pong so successful, however it features multiple fields and colorful characters and backgrounds as well as gameplay options such as special abilities in the form of power-ups.As well as the standard back and forth gameplay that Pong is known for, Pong: The Next Level also contains party style mini-games for multiple players via the playstation multitap.
